<title level="1" pfs="">[Skebs](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2471)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Skebs](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2471)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 8</row>

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Distracting Shadows** Skebs can use creatures that are at least one size larger than themself as [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) for the [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) actions.

**Items**
[daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 7

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Skebs deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Skebs
